item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:45, so let's meet just inside the theater ticket lobby at 7:15. I'll buy tickets, we can get snacks and then head into the movie. Afterwards, we can head to Uno's about a mile from the theater.

Hope to see you tomorrow for Dragon! Let me know if you're running late, get lost, or need to change your RSVP after about 5:00 tomorrow.

-Dana
508/308-4897

OLD STUFF:
Dragon looks like an adorable movie (animated) from Dreamworks about a boy who finds his path with the help of a friend. So I'm inviting all of you, my friends, to come see it with me. :-)


SUMMARY:
A Viking teenager named Hiccup lives on the island of Berk, where fighting dragons is a way of life. The teen's smarts and offbeat sense of humor don't sit too well with his tribe or its chief... who just happens to be Hiccup's father. However, when Hiccup is included in Dragon Training with the other Viking teens, he sees his chance to prove he has what it takes to be a fighter. But when he encounters (and ultimately befriends) an injured dragon, his world is flipped upside down, and what started out as Hiccup's one shot to prove himself turns into an opportunity to set a new course for the future of the entire tribe.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right inside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Unos to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for How To Train Your Dragon!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: How To Train Your Dragon
